activities.name: Create Gold Trip Data Green View

scripts.text:
CREATE VIEW gold.vw_trip_data_green
AS
select
gtd.filepath(1) as YEAR , -- based on the numerica value it will return the position of the wildcard character
gtd.filepath(2) as MONTH ,
gtd.*
From OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'gold/trip_data_green/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_src'
) with (
    borough VARCHAR(15),
    trip_date date,
    trip_day  VARCHAR(10),
    trip_day_weekend_ind CHAR(1),
    card_trip_count INT,
    cash_trip_count INT,
    Street_Hail_Trip_count INT,
    Dispatch_Trip_count INT,
    trip_distance FLOAT,
    trip_duration_minutes INT,
    fare_amount FLOAT
) as gtd;

activities.name: Create Gold Trip Data Green Agg

scripts.text:
IF OBJECT_ID ( 'silver.taxi_zone') is NOT NULL
    drop EXTERNAL TABLE silver.taxi_zone;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.taxi_zone 
        WITH (
            LOCATION = 'silver/taxi_zone',  
            DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,  
            FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format  
        )
    AS
    SELECT *from bronze.taxi_zone;

use nyc_taxi_discovery;

-- check for duplicates in tax_zone file

SELECT
tz.borough, 
count(*) as NO_OF_RECORDS
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIRSTROW = 2 ,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) WITH(
        location_id SMALLINT 1 ,
        borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
        zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
    )
    AS tz
    group by tz.borough
    HAVING count(*) > 1
;

rate_code_id, rate_code

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',

        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw'
    ) AS gtd
;

SELECT
  gtd.Payment_type, count(*)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw'
    ) AS gtd
    where gtd.total_amount < 0
    group by  gtd.Payment_type
;

use nyc_taxi_discovery;
--- Identify the number of trips made from each borough
select 
TOP 100
*
From OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT ='CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) as gtd
--WHERE PULocationID is null
;


--- Joining two tables
SELECT
 taxi_zone.*,gtd.*
from
    OPENROWSET(
                    BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/*.parquet',
                    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
                    FORMAT ='PARQUET'
                ) as gtd
    JOIN
    OPENROWSET(
                    BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
                    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
                    FORMAT = 'CSV',
                    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
                    FIRSTROW = 2 
        ) WITH(
            location_id SMALLINT 1 ,
            borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
            zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
            service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
        )
        AS taxi_zone
        ON gtd.PULocationID = taxi_zone.location_id
    ;
        

--- Joining two tables
SELECT
 taxi_zone.borough, count(1) as number_of_trips
from
    OPENROWSET(
                    BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/*.parquet',
                    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
                    FORMAT ='PARQUET'
                ) as gtd
    JOIN
    OPENROWSET(
                    BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
                    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
                    FORMAT = 'CSV',
                    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
                    FIRSTROW = 2 
        ) WITH(
            location_id SMALLINT 1 ,
            borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
            zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
            service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
        )
        AS taxi_zone
        ON gtd.PULocationID = taxi_zone.location_id
        group by taxi_zone.borough
        order by count(1) DESC
    ;

use nyc_taxi_discovery;
--Number of trips made by duration

select 
TOP 100
gtd.lpep_pickup_datetime
, gtd.lpep_dropoff_datetime
, DATEDIFF(minute, gtd.lpep_pickup_datetime, gtd.lpep_dropoff_datetime ) / 60 as from_date
, DATEDIFF(minute, gtd.lpep_pickup_datetime, gtd.lpep_dropoff_datetime ) / 60 + 1 as to_date
From OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw'
) as gtd
;

select 
 DATEDIFF(minute, gtd.lpep_pickup_datetime, gtd.lpep_dropoff_datetime ) / 60 as from_date
, DATEDIFF(minute, gtd.lpep_pickup_datetime, gtd.lpep_dropoff_datetime ) / 60 + 1 as to_date
, count(1) as no_of_trips
From OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw'
) as gtd
group by DATEDIFF(minute, gtd.lpep_pickup_datetime, gtd.lpep_dropoff_datetime ) / 60
        , DATEDIFF(minute, gtd.lpep_pickup_datetime, gtd.lpep_dropoff_datetime ) / 60 + 1
ORDER by from_date, to_date
;

use nyc_taxi_discovery;
/*
Identify the percentage of cash and card payments by borough 
Example Data as below
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
borough     total_trips     cash_trips      card_trips  cash_trips_percentage   card_trips_percentage
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Bronx       2019            751             1268        37.20                   62.80
Brooklyn    6435            2192            4243        34.06                   65.94
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*/

SELECT
*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIRSTROW = 2 ,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) WITH(
        location_id SMALLINT 1 ,
        borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
        zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
    ) as TZ
    ;

WITH v_payment_type as 
(select 
        CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.payment_type') as SMALLINT) as paymment_type,
        CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.payment_type_desc') as VARCHAR(15)) as paymment_type_desc
From OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'payment_type.json',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
) 
WITH(
    jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
) as PAYMENT_TYPE
),
v_taxi_zone as 
(
SELECT
*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIRSTROW = 2 ,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) WITH(
        location_id SMALLINT 1 ,
        borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
        zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
    ) as [result]   
),
v_trip_data AS
(
SELECT
*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2021/month=01/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw'
    ) AS [result]
)
select 
 v_taxi_zone.borough
 , count(1) as total_trips
 , sum(CASE when v_payment_type.paymment_type_desc  = 'Cash' then 1 else 0 end) as Cash_trip
 , sum(CASE when v_payment_type.paymment_type_desc  = 'Credit card' then 1 else 0 end) as Card_trip
 , CAST( 
     (sum(CASE when v_payment_type.paymment_type_desc  = 'Cash' then 1 else 0 end) / CAST(count(1) as DECIMAL))*100 as DECIMAL(5, 2)) as cash_trip_percentage
 , CAST( 
     (sum(CASE when v_payment_type.paymment_type_desc  = 'Credit card' then 1 else 0 end) / CAST(count(1) as DECIMAL))*100 as DECIMAL(5, 2)) as card_trip_percentage
From v_trip_data
LEFT join v_payment_type on (v_trip_data.payment_type = v_payment_type.paymment_type)
LEFT join v_taxi_zone on (v_trip_data.PULocationId = v_taxi_zone.Location_id )
where v_payment_type.paymment_type_desc in ('Cash','Credit card')
Group by v_taxi_zone.borough
order by v_taxi_zone.borough
;

use nyc_taxi_ldw

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE silver.usp_silver_trip_data_green
@year VARCHAR(4),
@month VARCHAR(2)
AS
BEGIN

    DECLARE @create_sql_stmt NVARCHAR(MAX),
            @drop_sql_stmt NVARCHAR(MAX);
    
    SET @create_sql_stmt = 
    'CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.trip_data_green_' + @year +'_' + @month +
        ' WITH (
            LOCATION = ''silver/trip_data_green/year=' + @year +'/month=' + @month +''',  
            DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,  
            FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format  
        )
    AS
    SELECT [VendorID] as vendor_id			
            ,[lpep_pickup_datetime]   
            ,[lpep_dropoff_datetime]  
            ,[store_and_fwd_flag]     
            ,[RatecodeID] as ratecode_id            
            ,[PULocationID] as pu_location_id           
            ,[DOLocationID] as do_location_id          
            ,[passenger_count]        
            ,[trip_distance]          
            ,[fare_amount]            
            ,[extra]                  
            ,[mta_tax]                
            ,[tip_amount]             
            ,[tolls_amount]           
            ,[ehail_fee]              
            ,[improvement_surcharge]  
            ,[total_amount]           
            ,[payment_type]           
            ,[trip_type]              
            ,[congestion_surcharge]
    from bronze.vw_trip_data_green_csv 
    where YEAR ='''+ @year +''' 
    and MONTH='''+ @month +'''';
   
   print(@create_sql_stmt);

   EXEC SP_executesql @create_sql_stmt;

   SET @drop_sql_stmt = 'DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.trip_data_green_' + @year +'_' + @month;

   print(@drop_sql_stmt);

   EXEC SP_executesql @drop_sql_stmt;

END
GO

IF OBJECT_ID ( 'silver.trip_data_green_2020_01') is NOT NULL
    drop EXTERNAL TABLE silver.trip_data_green_2020_01
    -- creating external table trip_data_green_2020_01
    CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.trip_data_green_2020_01 
        WITH (
            LOCATION = 'silver/trip_data_green/year=2020/month=01',  
            DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,  
            FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE gold.usp_gold_trip_data_green
@year VARCHAR(4),
@month VARCHAR(2)
AS
BEGIN

    DECLARE @create_sql_stmt NVARCHAR(MAX),
            @drop_sql_stmt NVARCHAR(MAX);
    
    SET @create_sql_stmt = 
    'CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.trip_data_green_' + @year +'_' + @month +
        ' WITH (
            LOCATION = ''gold/trip_data_green/year=' + @year +'/month=' + @month +''',  
            DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,  
            FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format  
        )
    AS
    SELECT 
        tdg.year,
        tdg.month,
        tz.borough,
        convert(DATE, lpep_pickup_datetime) as trip_date,
        cal.day_name as trip_day,
        CASE WHEN cal.day_name in (''Saturday'',''Sunday'') THEN ''Y'' else ''N'' END as trip_day_weekend_ind,
        sum(CASE WHEN PT.description = ''Credit Card'' THEN 1 else 0 end) as card_trip_count,
        sum(CASE WHEN PT.description = ''Cash'' THEN 1 else 0 end) as cash_trip_count,
        sum(CASE WHEN tt.trip_type_desc = ''Street-hail'' THEN 1 else 0 end) as Street_Hail_Trip_count,
        sum(CASE WHEN tt.trip_type_desc = ''Dispatch'' THEN 1 else 0 end) as Dispatch_Trip_count,
        SUM(tdg.trip_distance) as trip_distance,
        SUM(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, tdg.lpep_pickup_datetime, tdg.lpep_dropoff_datetime)) as trip_duration_minutes,
        SUM(tdg.fare_amount) as fare_amount
        from SILVER.vw_trip_data_green tdg
        JOIN SILVER.TAXI_ZONE TZ on (tdg.pu_location_id = tz.location_id)
        JOIN silver.calendar CAL on (cal.date = convert(DATE, lpep_pickup_datetime))
        JOIN SILVER.Payment_type pt on (tdg.payment_type = pt.payment_type)
        JOIN silver.trip_type tt on (tdg.trip_type = tt.trip_type)
    where tdg.YEAR ='''+ @year +''' 
    and tdg.MONTH='''+ @month +'''
    group by tdg.year,
         tdg.month,
         tz.borough,
         convert(DATE, lpep_pickup_datetime), 
         cal.day_name';
   
   print(@create_sql_stmt);

   EXEC SP_executesql @create_sql_stmt;

   SET @drop_sql_stmt = 'DROP EXTERNAL TABLE gold.trip_data_green_' + @year +'_' + @month;

   print(@drop_sql_stmt);

   EXEC SP_executesql @drop_sql_stmt;
END
GO

---CSV file format
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT *FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name='csv_file_format')
    CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csv_file_format  
    WITH (  
            FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT
        , FORMAT_OPTIONS (
                FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',' , 
                STRING_DELIMITER = '"', 
                First_Row = 2 , -- ONLY AVAILABLE FOR AZURE SYNAPSE ANALYTICS
                USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE ,
                Encoding = 'UTF8' ,
                PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
                )  
    );

--- TSV file format 

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT *FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name='tsv_file_format')
    CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT tsv_file_format  
    WITH (  
            FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT
        , FORMAT_OPTIONS (
                FIELD_TERMINATOR = '\t' , 
                STRING_DELIMITER = '"', 
                First_Row = 2 , -- ONLY AVAILABLE FOR AZURE SYNAPSE ANALYTICS
                USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE ,
                Encoding = 'UTF8' ,
                PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
                )  
    );

--- Parquet file format

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT *FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name='parquet_file_format')
    CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT parquet_file_format  
WITH (  
         FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET 
         , DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'   
    );


-- Create an external file format for delta table files (serverless SQL pools in Synapse analytics and SQL Server 2022).
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT *FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name='delta_file_format')
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT delta_file_format  
WITH (  
         FORMAT_TYPE = DELTA  
         -- DATA_COMPRESSION is available only in SQL Server
        , DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec' )
;

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE silver.sp_silver_rate_code
AS
BEGIN 

    IF OBJECT_ID ( 'silver.rate_code') is NOT NULL
        drop EXTERNAL TABLE silver.rate_code
        -- creating external table rate_code
        CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.rate_code 
            WITH (
                LOCATION = 'silver/rate_code',  
                DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,  
                FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format  
            )
        AS
    select 
    rate_code_id, rate_code
    From OPENROWSET (
        BULK 'raw/rate_code.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_SRC',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
    ) 
    WITH(
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) as RATE_CODE
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH (
        rate_code_id TINYINT,
        rate_code VARCHAR(20)
    )
END;

GO

select TOP 100 * from SILVER.TAXI_ZONE;


    SELECT 
        tdg.year,
        tdg.month,
        tz.borough,
        convert(DATE, lpep_pickup_datetime) as trip_date,
        cal.day_name as trip_day,
        CASE WHEN cal.day_name in ('Saturday','Sunday') THEN 'Y' else 'N' END as trip_day_weekend_ind,
        sum(CASE WHEN PT.description = 'Credit Card' THEN 1 else 0 end) as card_trip_count,
        sum(CASE WHEN PT.description = 'Cash' THEN 1 else 0 end) as cash_trip_count,
        sum(CASE WHEN tt.trip_type_desc = 'Street-hail' THEN 1 else 0 end) as Street_Hail_Trip_count,
        sum(CASE WHEN tt.trip_type_desc = 'Dispatch' THEN 1 else 0 end) as Dispatch_Trip_count,
        SUM(tdg.trip_distance) as trip_distance,
        SUM(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, tdg.lpep_pickup_datetime, tdg.lpep_dropoff_datetime)) as trip_duration_minutes,
        SUM(tdg.fare_amount) as fare_amount
        from SILVER.vw_trip_data_green tdg
        JOIN SILVER.TAXI_ZONE TZ on (tdg.pu_location_id = tz.location_id)
        JOIN silver.calendar CAL on (cal.date = convert(DATE, lpep_pickup_datetime))
        JOIN SILVER.Payment_type pt on (tdg.payment_type = pt.payment_type)
        JOIN silver.trip_type tt on (tdg.trip_type = tt.trip_type)
    where tdg.YEAR ='2020' 
    and tdg.MONTH='04'
    group by tdg.year,
         tdg.month,
         tz.borough,
         convert(DATE, lpep_pickup_datetime), 
         cal.day_name
;

source:
## Trip Data Aggregation 
### Group By Columns
1. year
2. Month
3. Pickup Location ID
4. Drop Off Location ID

### Aggregated Columns
1. Total Trip Count
2. Total Fare Amount

### Purpose of the notebook

Demonstrate the integration between Spark Pool and Serverless SQL Pool

1. Create the aggregated table in Spark Pool
2. Access the data from Serverless SQL Pool

#Set the folder paths so that it can be used later. 
bronze_folder_path = 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@sudisynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/raw'
silver_folder_path = 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@sudisynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/silver'
gold_folder_path = 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@sudisynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/gold'
#Set the spark config to be able to get the partitioned columns year and month as strings rather than integers

%%sql

-- Create database to which we are going to write the data

CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS nyc_taxi_ldw_spark
LOCATION 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@sudisynapsecoursedl.dfs.core.windows.net/gold';
# Read the silver data to be processed.

# Perform the required aggregations
# 1. Total trip count
# 2. Total fare amount
from pyspark.sql.functions import *

trip_data_green_agg_df = trip_data_green_df \
                        .groupBy("year", "month", "pu_location_id", "do_location_id") \
                        .agg(count(lit(1)).alias("total_trip_count"),
                        round(sum("fare_amount"), 2).alias("total_fare_amount"))

# Write the aggregated data to the gold table for consumption

trip_data_green_agg_df.write.mode("overwrite").partitionBy("year", "month").format("parquet").saveAsTable("nyc_taxi_ldw_spark.trip_data_green_agg")
